# Bourdon German war cemetery

|nearest_town=Bourdon, Somme, France
|total= 22,216
|unknowns=
|commemorated=
|by_country=Germany
|by_war=World War II
|source=[https://kriegsgraeberstaetten.volksbund.de/friedhof/bourdon German War Graves Commission]
}}
Bourdon German war cemetery is a Second World War German military war grave cemetery, located  northwest of Amiens and close to the village of Bourdon in the Somme department, France.

File:Deutscher Soldatenfriedhof Bourdon - Die Mutter.jpg|sculpture by Gerhard Marcks, Die Mutter [The Mother]
